Non-functional APIs

Source: vignettes/web_only/Non_functional_APIs.Rmd
Non_functional_APIs.Rmd

Context

To ensure a viable service, the APIs accessible with happign are tested for errors every 12:00 AM on sunday. If you also detect non-viable APIs, please describe your problem here.


WFS

Testing all 284 WFS resources took 3.01 mins.

There is 6 request that return an HTTP error 400 (Bad Request) of WFS service. Details of bad urls and errors they return are displayed below :


WMS raster

http error

Testing all 231 WMS resources for http errors took 0.87 mins.

There is 0 request that return an HTTP error of WFS service. Details of bad urls and errors they return are displayed below :

Unreadable layer by happign

For some API, no connection can be established by GDAL because of how resources are formatted on the IGN database. This also means that the get_wms_raster function canâ€™t connect to the layer. To avoid this problem you just have to set a name for the filename argument (for example : get_wms_layer(shape, "satellite", "ORTHOIMAGERY.ORTHO-SAT.PLEIADES.2017", filename = "best_layer_name_ever")). When a file name is set, the layer is directly download on disk, so be careful with area of your shape.

Testing all 231 WFS resources took 1.66 mins.

There are 3 categories that have no WMS raster resources : adresse, geodesie, topographie .

There are 0 resources that canâ€™t be read by happign for the moment. Details of them are displayed below :
